item.name: Dungeon Lords
item.comment: One of those games I just never do well at. But a great game nonetheless.

item.name: In the Year of the Dragon
Lancaster
item.comment: Good game with a bidding round that's always entertaining.

item.name: Macao
item.comment: Very nice game and different every time.

item.name: Mage Knight Board Game
item.comment: Awesome game. Win or lose, it's a lot of fun.

item.name: Mage Knight Board Game: Krang Character Expansion
item.comment: Is it wrong to rate my own game as a 10? Ah, what the hell!

item.name: Mage Knight Board Game: The Lost Legion
Pickomino
item.comment: Fun and quick. And often infuriating :)

item.name: Race for the Galaxy
item.comment: Quick but involved and very skillful game.

item.name: Race for the Galaxy: Rebel vs Imperium
Race for the Galaxy: The Brink of War
Race for the Galaxy: The Gathering Storm
item.comment: An excellent expansion to an excellent game.

item.name: Sid Meier's Civilization: The Board Game
Small World: Grand Dames of Small World
Snowdonia
item.comment: A lot more fun that building a railway up a mountain in the rain. Great game and surprisingly quick.

item.name: Through the Ages: A New Story of Civilization
Through the Ages: A Story of Civilization
item.comment: Very deep and skillful game that's different every time.

item.name: Tzolk'in: The Mayan Calendar – Tribes & Prophecies
